pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
Still have tests that failed... 
But ModelListWidget_TEST.LinkProperties and gzTest.Model are passing on my computer.
INTEGRATION_world_reset.test_ran too, even I get errors about simbody and bullet. And it don't use deeply_nested_models.world  but nested_models.world, so this PR should impact it.
